files.description: generates individual_level_data.dta from xwvsevs_1981_2000_v20060423_wave4_vars_Pinotti_RESTAT2012.dta. The same file works on the original WVS four-wave aggregate data file, version 20060423, which can be obtained (upon registration) from "http://spitswww.uvt.nl/web/fsw/evs/datadownload/xwvsevs_1981_2000_v20060423_dta.zip"
files.label: make_individual_level_data.do

dataFile.description: generates individual_level_data.dta from xwvsevs_1981_2000_v20060423_wave4_vars_Pinotti_RESTAT2012.dta. The same file works on the original WVS four-wave aggregate data file, version 20060423, which can be obtained (upon registration) from "http://spitswww.uvt.nl/web/fsw/evs/datadownload/xwvsevs_1981_2000_v20060423_dta.zip"

files.description: country populations in year 2000, used by make_individual_level_data.do to compute sampling weights

files.description: generates all tables and figures in the paper using individual_level_data.dta

files.description: exctract of the official WVS four-wave aggregate data file, version 20060423. The complete WVS archive can be obtained (upon registration) from "http://spitswww.uvt.nl/web/fsw/evs/datadownload/xwvsevs_1981_2000_v20060423_dta.zip".  The version here is obtained by keeping only the 4th wave (s002==4) and the variables e042 a165 s024 x025r x047r x028 x035_2 x001 x003 s017
files.label: xwvsevs_1981_2000_v20060423_wave4_vars_Pinotti_RESTAT2012.dta

dataFile.description: exctract of the official WVS four-wave aggregate data file, version 20060423. The complete WVS archive can be obtained (upon registration) from "http://spitswww.uvt.nl/web/fsw/evs/datadownload/xwvsevs_1981_2000_v20060423_dta.zip".  The version here is obtained by keeping only the 4th wave (s002==4) and the variables e042 a165 s024 x025r x047r x028 x035_2 x001 x003 s017
